item.title: Client Freezes
item.dc:creator: @pokemondner pokemondner
item.description:
@pokemondner wrote:

When I spawn the Korasi Sword my client freezes everytime

Here are my intergers
case 13350:
itemDef.name = “Korasi’s sword”;
itemDef.itemActions = new String[5];
itemDef.itemActions[1] = “Weild”;
itemDef.modelID = 57784;
itemDef.modelZoom = 1400;
itemDef.modelRotationY = 700;
itemDef.modelRotationX = 60;
itemDef.modelOffset1 = 25;
itemDef.modelOffset2 = 60;
itemDef.anInt165 = 57780;
itemDef.anInt200 = 57780;
itemDef.description = “The sword of a Void Knight.”.getBytes();
break;

I know the models are right i have them in the RAW folder.
What am i doing wrong?
~Zachy

Read full topic
